DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect interval training , based-intensity 70 % 110 % oxygen consumption workload attain ventilatory anaerobic threshold , aerobic functional capacity , autonomic modulation heart rate , metabolic profile patient without coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Optimization Interval Exercise Based-intensity Ventilatory Anaerobic Threshold Coronary Artery Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Exercise training essential component cardiac rehabilitation . However , know interval training base ventilatory anaerobic threshold could effective improve aerobic functional capacity metabolic profile . Objective : To investigate effect interval training , based-intensity 70 % 110 % oxygen consumption workload attain ventilatory anaerobic threshold , aerobic functional capacity , autonomic modulation heart rate , metabolic profile patient without coronary artery disease . Design : Prospective randomized control trial . Subjects : 68 men 40 65 year old . All subject submit : 1 . - Clinical assessment : personal data , lifestyle food , family history , current previous history disease . 2 . - Physical examination : cardiac lung auscultation , measurement heart rate , blood pressure , body weight height . 3 . - Heart rate record rest , supine position 15 min , stand position 10 min respiratory sinus arrhythmia maneuver . 4 . - Submaximal symptom-limited cardiopulmonary exercise test cycle ergometer perform determined ventilatory anaerobic threshold . 5 . - Two cardiopulmonary exercise test treadmill constant workload ( moderate high intensity ) . Expiratory flow limitation evaluate flow-volume loop end exercise workload . 6 . - Blood sample collect analyze glycemic lipid profile . 7 . - After procedure , subject randomly assign one two group , train group control group . 8 . - Interval training program consist 30-40 minute exercise session , three time week 16 week , workload determine basis ventilatory anaerobic threshold . 9 . - At 48 hour last day training , subject repeat experimental procedure baseline test . Controls retested 16 week completion baseline test . 10 . - All subject instruct maintain habitual diet without standardized caloric restriction . Thus , expect interval training promote beneficial physiological adaptation patient without coronary artery disease .
DOC.criteria: All patient undergo medical investigation coronary artery disease , coronary angiography , Hemodynamics Center local Hospital . After procedure , CAD+ group include 34 patient , clinical evidence significant stenosis ( < 50 % stenosis one major coronary vessel ) , previous coronary artery intervention ( percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery ) . The CAD group comprise 32 patient without stenosis coronary vessel ( angiographically document ) without history previous myocardial infarction ( MI ) , PCI CABG . All patient three cardiovascular risk factor obesity ( body mass index > 30 kg/m2 ) , smoke , sedentary lifestyle accord International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) version 6 , hypertension , diabetes mellitus ( type 2 nonusers insulin ) , dyslipidemia . The exclusion criterion consist MI < 6 month , PCI CABG < 3 month Severe cardiac arrhythmia Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease Unstable angina Osteomuscular disorder Diabetes mellitus ( user insulin ) Renal failure Sequelae associate stroke .
